metadata.name: Divine Matrix
metadata.description:
The foundations upon which the universe was created.

"Divine Matrix" is an interactive piece that invites you to immerse yourself in a celestial landscape of swirling colors and patterns, evoking a sense of wonder and awe. As you interact with the piece, you become a part of the artwork, shaping and transforming the ethereal environment surrounding you.

"We are not separate from the universe; we are one with the sun, the moon, the stars, and everything else." - Thich Nhat Hanh

In order to access all interactive features please open the piece using the live link.

Keyboard functions:  
- [1-7]: select matrix style  
- [p]: increase segment size  
- [o]: decrease segment size  
- [l]: increase matrix thickness  
- [k]: decrease matrix thickness  
- [s]: save screenshot as .png  
- [g]: save 10-second .gif  
- [t]: save 2-second .gif  
- [n]: new matrix (same style / size)  
- [r]: new random matrix (new style / size)  
- [a]: alternate matrix color style  
- [x]: increase star size  
- [z]: decrease star size  
- [v]: increase frame rate  
- [c]: decrease frame rate  
- [f]: full-screen mode

Touch functions:  
- 2-finger swipe right: next style  
- 2-finger swipe left: previous style  
- Scroll up: increase segment size  
- Scroll down: decrease segment size  
- Open 2 fingers (inside matrix): increase matrix thickness  
- Close 2 fingers (inside matrix): decrease matrix thickness  
- Open 2 fingers (outside matrix): increase star size  
- Close 2 fingers (outside matrix): decrease star size  
- 3-finger scroll up: increase frame rate  
- 3-finger scroll down: decrease frame rate  
- Double-tap: alternate matrix color style

Made with love and p5.js.
